segments.text: I have to go up to London for a couple of days next week.Would you like to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be nice.How are you getting there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I prefer to go on the train , but I suppose you want me to take the car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I much prefer to go by car , then we don't need to get to the station with our luggage and ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I've got to drive.You know I'm not fond of that . I found it much more relaxing to sit in the train .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But very much quicker.But I know we'll never agree on this subject.You prefer the car . I prefer the train .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now.Have you ever thought of going by express bus ?
segments.speaker: S2
